name: Avory
short: Non duis ut photo booth occaecat. In XOXO snackwave knausgaard cronut shabby chic cupidatat qui hashtag.
long: Waterproof, windproof, weatherproof the Avory withholds a membrane between the outer layer and the inner lining, making all the products 100% water resistant. Put your foot directly in a running river and your feet will stay dry - you can now wear sneakers in the winter, you are welcome.
